mapper.update:
update wx_user
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subscribe = #{subscribe,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`language` = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wx_user set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscribe = #{subscribe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `language` = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscribeTime = #{subscribetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select b.* from user_qrcode a inner join wx_user b on a.new_id = b.id and a.old_id = #{wxUser.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
